document.full_text: gunmen have killed a u.n. driver in ethiopia's somali region in an ambush that also injured another staff member, the world food programme said on saturday.
document.title: gunmen kill u.n. worker in ethiopia's somali region
lines_and_colors: gunmen have killed a u.n. driver in ethiopia's somali region in an ambush that also injured another staff member, the world food programme said on saturday.
